## Data loading
```{r}
clients <- vroom(here("data", "client.csv"))
accounts <- vroom(here("data", "account.csv"))
disp <- vroom(here("data", "disp.csv"))
```

## Join data tables

### Inner join

```{r}
da <- inner_join(accounts, disp)
```
